1221810.name: AstroCleaners
1221810.description:
Join AstroCleaners, a space pest control agency that fights giant aliens in this unique looter shoot em up.
Buy from an unlimited source of randomly generated weapons and killer robots to aid you in your dangerous job.
Unlock all kinds of different "Cleaners", trained alien hunters each one with unique abilities and advantages.
1221810.supported_languages: 英语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
